name: Delia Sheppard
biography: Delia Sheppard was born on July 29, 1960 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She is an actress, known for The Big Short (2015), Rocky V (1990) and Now You See Me (2013).::Anonymous
trivia: Penthouse Pet of the Month April 1988
Former showgirl at Paris' famous Lido.
Natural blonde who often works as a brunette or redhead.
Completed degree as Doctor of Holistic Medicine including Shamanism, Chinese Herbology, Homeopathy and all Alternative health Modalities.
Master of 18 weapons of the Shaolin Temple. Specializing in 7 star straight sword.
France and USA. Practicing Alternative health modalities. Design. Production. Choreography. Film and television internationally. [June 2012]
France and USA. Staying active in Alternative medicine. Design. Choreography. Film and television and voice over in four languages. [January 2010]
Working as a showgirl in Las Vegas, Nevada. [2000]
Principal dancer in Frederic Apcar's "Hot Streak" at Harrah's Reno 1983.
Principal dancer in "Splash" at Riviera Las Vegas 1995-1998.
Studied at Stella Adler Conservatory of Acting.
2011 till present working in film and television and in production for Cirque Du Soleil.
filmography: Larry the Cable Guy's Christmas Spectacular
Point of Seduction: Body Chemistry III
Born on the Fourth of July
